dct_title_s: Map of the United States : compiled from the latest authorities
dct_description_sm: Relief shown by hachures. Longitude west from Greenwich and east and west from Washington, D.C. Latitude north from equator. Colored by state and territory. Engraved by Eleazer Huntington. Includes a table showing distances from Washington to the capital or largest town of each state, the distance from each capital or largest town to each of the others, and the number of inhabitants in 1830.
